shootergame.interactor

Class Lava

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.Body
      • city.cs.engine.StaticBody
        • shootergame.interactor.Lava
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    city.cs.engine.SensorListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Lava
extends city.cs.engine.StaticBody
implements city.cs.engine.SensorListener
    This renders an array of lava. If the player or the enemy touches the lava then they will get destroyed. If the player touches the lava the game will restart the level however if the enemy touches it the enemy track will increment.

     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
            java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
            java.io.IOException
        Constructor for Lava.
        Parameters:
        world - World the Lava will be in.
        player - Player object that will be destroyed if there's collision.
        position - Position of the Lava.
        length - Amount of Lava blocks on x-axis
        startPosX - Starting position of the lava.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If File not found.
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - If unsupported audio file is played.
        java.io.IOException - Error with IO.
